nodes.text: Star Wars: Visions is an upcoming animated anthology television series. Its initial release will comprise of nine anime-inspired original short films from various Japanese animation studios that present a different cultural perspective to Star Wars. The series is scheduled to premiere on the video streaming service Disney+ on September 22, 2021. The novel Ronin will tie into one of the shorts.

Presenting all-new, creative takes on the galaxy far, far away, Star Wars: Visions will be a series of animated short films celebrating Star Wars through the lens of the world's best anime creators. The anthology collection will bring 10 fantastic visions from several of the leading Japanese anime studios, offering a fresh and diverse cultural perspective to Star Wars.
